title: Create Payment Detail Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying detailed payment information including transaction details and status

user_stories: As a customer, I want to view detailed payment information so that I can verify transaction details
As a service provider, I want to see payment details so that I can reconcile my earnings
business_rules: Payment detail view must show complete transaction information
Payment detail view must follow the design system
Payment detail view must handle loading states and error messages
Payment detail view must display status information clearly
edge_cases: Handling loading states for payment details
Managing error conditions when payment data is not available
Displaying payment information with proper status indicators
Handling payments with missing or incomplete information

acceptance_criteria: Payment detail component shows complete transaction information
Payment detail component follows the design system
Payment detail component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Payment detail component integrates with Payment Management API endpoints
Payment detail component displays related booking information

integration_tests: Payment detail integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement payment detail component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with payment management API. Display related information like booking details.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for payment detail access. Protect sensitive payment information. Validate data before display.
